text: Iz*One is a South Korean idol girl group. Izone or iZone may refer to: * Izone, Rolleston, a business park in the Selwyn District in New Zealand * Polaroid i-Zone, instant camera products * iZone, a WiFi hotspot system in Etisalat, UAE * iZone, an eyewear business in Massachusetts with stores listed at exits on the Massachusetts Turnpike * Innovation zone ** A program in New York City Public Schools, as referenced in Globaloria ** Also used by Sharon L. Contreras for school programs in Syracuse, New York, US
title: Izone (disambiguation)
